SEARCH
Package com.tarjanyicsanad.domain.repository

Interface LoanRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryLoanRepository, JpaLoanRepository
public interface LoanRepository
A repository for managing Loans.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addLoan(Loan loan)
    Add a new loan to the repository
    Set<Loan>
    findAllLoans()
    Get all loans from the repository
    Set<Loan>
    findLoansByBookId(int bookId)
    Get all loans with the given book id from the repository

    getLoan(int id)
    Returns a loan with the given id.
    void

    Remove a loan from the repository

    Remove all loans with the given book id from the repository
    void
    updateLoan(Loan loan)
    Updates the loan with the same id as the given loan.

  • Method Details

    • addLoan

      void addLoan(Loan loan)
      Add a new loan to the repository
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to add

    • getLoan

      Optional<Loan> getLoan(int id)
      Returns a loan with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the loan to return
      Returns:
      an empty optional if no loan with the given id is found

    • findAllLoans

      Set<Loan> findAllLoans()
      Get all loans from the repository
      Returns:
      a set of all loans

    • findLoansByBookId

      Set<Loan> findLoansByBookId(int bookId)
      Get all loans with the given book id from the repository
      Parameters:
      bookId - the id of the book to get loans for
      Returns:
      a set of all loans with the given book id

    • removeLoan

      void removeLoan(int id) throws LoanNotFoundException
      Remove a loan from the repository
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the loan to remove
      Throws:
      LoanNotFoundException - if the loan with the given id is not found

    • removeLoansByBookId

      void removeLoansByBookId(int bookId)
      Remove all loans with the given book id from the repository
      Parameters:
      bookId - the id of the book to remove loans for

    • updateLoan

      void updateLoan(Loan loan) throws LoanNotFoundException
      Updates the loan with the same id as the given loan.
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to update
      Throws:
      LoanNotFoundException - if no loan with the same id is found
